summary: Balanced additions to some Nightingale equipment.
descriptionHtml:
Adds a balanced leveled Fortify Archery enchantment to the Nightingale Hood and Fortify Carry Weight enchantment to the Nightingale Boots. 
Archery enchantment was matched to the One Handed enchantment of the gloves.

+15% Archery damage to the level 1-18 hood
+20% Archery damage to the level 19-31 hood
+25% Archery damage to the level 32+ hood

+30 Carry Weight to the level 1-18 boots
+45 Carry Weight to the level 19-31 boots
+60 Carry Weight to the level 32+ boots

Reduces the weight of the Nightingale weapons. Halving the weight in most cases. Seemed logical weapons of Daedric origin designed for stealthy characters would be lighter than their natural equivalents.

Also fixes the level 46+ Nightingale Blade bug. Allows it to be improved at the Grinding Wheel.
author: AzOutback
